data.title: WOW! WHAT A FIND
data.text: Ok, question of the week....what great restaurant exists in the middle of a non-demominational church complex? The answer is The Grill!! What a nice, family oriented restaurant this is. Run by the attached church (name I never got) this was a stumble upon restaurant that I found when I stayed overnight at the next door Marriott Fairfield Inn. The menu has appetizers and many different sandwiches, pizzas and salads as well as a few entrees. One member of our party had the salmon which was exceptionally good. My steak tacos were great as well. The setting is very nice and I have to mention that the service staff is GREAT!! You will not be disappointed.

data.title: Very good food, wonderful friendly service!
data.text: I have been at The Grill many times with friends.. the food has always been wonderful!  Fantastic for families with children... will be sure to bring grand-daughter when she comes to visit. Lattes are perfect, soups really good... all dishes well prepared an delicious!

data.title: Excellent Food and Excellent Service!
data.text:
This is a restaurant that takes excellence to the next level. The food was prepared and presented in true excellence. The value is unbelievable and extremely unfair; you should be paying more. The details are spot on, even down to the cup of chai that I ordered.
The environment has modern decor, with great space and seating. You seem to get lost in the personal space of the restaurant, great for conversations. It is located inside Calvary Chapel Ft.Lauderdale with plenty of parking and extremely safe environment. If you have kids theres a humongous playground next to the restaurant. 
The service is 5 star, mainly because of the GENUINE care and service of the waiters.

data.title: A fantastic discovery a slice of heaven!
data.text: I discovered this just by chance and what a discovery. Beautiful decor, spacious, modern and a lovely choice of food. Had lunch and breakfast there and have since told several friends who have had same reaction. The waiters are the best I have ever met, so courteous ,friendly and genuine. I would rate this  five star .
